venueData.p: Join us at DevFest 2023 Bhubaneswar, hosted at a modern, centrally located venue equipped for tech talks, networking, and innovation.

socialMedia.h2: Keep in touch with DevFest Bhubaneswar for the latest announcements
socialMedia.p: Let's get connected so that we can reach out to each other via a simple notification.

hero.p: Come learn, network and celebrate with the Google Developer Ecosystem while also learning to new technologies on Android, Chrome, and Web.

WhatIsDevFest.p: DevFests are local conferences hosted by Google Developer Groups (GDG) around the world. Each DevFest event is crafted by its local organizers to fit the needs and interests of its local developer community. Whether it be through hands-on learning experiences, technical talks delivered in local languages by experts, or by simply meeting fellow local developers, DevFest attendees learn how to build together and innovate on Google's developer tools.

whyAttend.p: We have a fantastic lineup of speakers and sessions for you to learn and enhance your skills.

points.p: Several speakers are coming together to talk about their experiences in the industry. We will also have a few lightning talks with our members.
Experts from the industry will be on hand to answer your questions and give you advice on how to get into the industry.
You will have the opportunity to network with other students and professionals in the industry.
We will be hosting a series of workshops to assist you in getting started with your tech career. Our members will also give a few lightning talks.

Technologies.p: The sessions that span from technical to visionary, let’s celebrate and discover what the technologies can enable: how product innovation, open source, and ML and AI can propel enterprises forward and solve the big problems that impact all of us.

highlights.p: DevFest: Global tech conference by GDG, tailored to local devs, emphasizes knowledge sharing, networking, and Google tech.

speaker.p: Discover industry experts, thought leaders, and innovators who'll inspire, educate, and share invaluable insights. Join us to learn from tech's finest.

speakerlists.name: Suraj Harichandan
speakerlists.designation: MTE Salesforce, Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Architect

speakerlists.name: Tarun R Jain
speakerlists.designation: Developer Relations Manager at AI Planet and GDE in ML
speakerlists.talk: Parameter Efficient Fine tuning of Large Language Models

speakerlists.name: Nitin Prakash
speakerlists.designation: Senior Software Engineer, Upswing Financial Technologies
speakerlists.talk: Biometric Auth API with Clean Code

speakerlists.name: Vaibhav Malpani
speakerlists.talk: Where Should I Run My Stuff? Choosing Compute Options

speakerlists.name: Sangram Rath
speakerlists.designation: OD10 Ventures Founder, Cloud Architect & Technology Advisor
speakerlists.talk: Google Cloud Architecture Framework for Developers

tickets.p: Secure your spot at DevFest 2023 in Bhubaneswar! Book your ticket now for a tech-filled experience and networking opportunities. Don't miss out!

ticketSection.title: Tickets
ticketSection.p: Embark on a tech journey at DevFest 2023 Bhubaneswar! Reserve your seat for cutting-edge insights, workshops, and networking. Seize the opportunity—book your ticket today!

options.description: Perfect for students eager to learn and connect.
benefits: Access to hands-on workshops and sessions
Learn, Enjoy, and Participate in a vibrant tech community
Grow your knowledge with expert insights
Chance to participate in fun activities

options.description: Designed for professionals aiming to elevate their skills.
benefits: Access to hands-on workshops and advanced sessions
Network with industry experts and fellow professionals
Learn, Enjoy, and Participate in cutting-edge discussions
Expand your knowledge with insights from expert speakers
Optimize your resources for professional growth
Opportunity to engage in networking activities

WhySponsors.p: Our goal is to have 600+ attendees, with a mix of talented crowd – start-up founders, tech industry experts, developers. So, it will be an excellent opportunity for our sponsors to reach various demographics. will surely open new prospects for your brand. Sponsoring us will benefit you in more ways than one, including an increase in brand exposure and the opportunity to get participant data for your purposes. Bringing fresh minds to your booths, handing out promotional materials to the attendees, and networking with individuals in and around Bhubaneswar
